title: Ben Wallace – 2021 Comments on UK Carrier Strike Group Sailing to Japan
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 27 April 2021.
content:
The Carrier Strike Group’s engagement with Japan will enhance the already deep defence partnership between our two countries.
